page.title: 03WILLESDEN BUS GARAGE
page.content: {Willesden Bus Garage}is an important centre for travel throughout London. Buses travel in all directions from there.The busiest of the routes is the No.52 which journeys outwards to Mill Hill Broadway and inwards to Victoria. The bus is one of the few two-manned Routemaster buses still in operation. A No.52 should run every six minutes during the rush hour. The following buses leave Willesden Garage for these destinations:- No. 8{To Bow No.176{To Forest Hill No.260{To North Finchley & Hammersmith No.266{To Brent Cross & Hammersmith No.297{To Alperton The garage is a repair centre with mechanics on site.A new development of offices was recently added.Finally, there ia plaque commemorating the dead transport workers of the 1914-18 war.
